name: Bubbo: The Lost Hat
description:
Help Bubbo find his hat in this 10 level platformer! Arrow keys/WASD to move and Esc/P to pause.

Please refrain from skipping levels and/or cutscenes during your first playthrough. Cutscenes contain important tutorials and you might be confused if you skip them.

Download: https://christiansheehan.com/bubbo

Created by Christian Sheehan (christiansheehan.com)
